Dear all,

Sorry for the sligthly off topic message but I would like to complete my
testing toolset with a Design By Contract tool in Java.

There was iContract some years ago, but it looks no longer available.

Does anybody in this list uses daily a DbC tool similar to iContract in
his projects?

Cheers,

	Daniel

--
